name: Water (Preload)
properties: Appetite suppressant when consumed before meals
Part of 21 Tweaks for weight loss
Cold water may have metabolic benefits
benefits: Preloading with water before meals helps with appetite suppression and reduces caloric intake. Studies show that drinking water before meals can enhance weight loss. Also helps with hydration and metabolic function.

quotes: PRELOAD WITH WATER - Consume 2 cups of cold or room-temperature water before each meal.
